augments.name: Ace Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Ace Emblem and a Draven.

augments.name: Ace in the Hole
augments.desc: Gain an Ace Emblem, a Draven, a Miss Fortune, and a Samira.

augments.name: A.D.M.I.N Crest
augments.desc: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem and a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: A.D.M.I.N Crown
augments.desc: Gain an A.D.M.I.N. Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Camille.

augments.name: A.D.M.I.N. Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional A.D.M.I.N. Gain a Camille.

augments.name: Aegis Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Aegis Emblem and a Vi.

augments.name: Aegis Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Aegis Emblem, a Redemption, and an Alistar.

augments.name: Aegis Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Aegis. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: AFK
augments.desc: You cannot perform actions for the next 3 rounds. Afterwards, gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Stubborn
augments.desc: Gain an Alistar. Combat start: He 50% Shreds (MR reduction) all enemy units.

augments.name: Behemoth
augments.desc: Gain an Alistar. He gains 350 maximum health. His ability hits all adjacent enemies, and deals bonus damage to his primary target equal to 25% of his maximum health.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 8 gold.

augments.name: Anima Squad Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem and a Sylas.

augments.name: Anima Squad Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Anima Squad Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

augments.name: Anima Squad Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Anima Squad. Gain a Jinx.

augments.name: Pyromania
augments.desc: Gain an Annie. Her spell is larger, and the every cast, stuns all target hits for 2 seconds.

augments.name: Burning Spirit
augments.desc: Gain an Annie. When you field her, your team gains 15 Ability Power, tripled while they are below 50% Health.

augments.name: Ascension
augments.desc: After 15 seconds of combat, your units deal 50% more damage.

augments.name: Laser Focus
augments.desc: Gain an Ashe. She gains 45% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

augments.name: Corps Focus
augments.desc: Gain an Ashe. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled while her Ability is active.

augments.name: Extinction Event
augments.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. He has 15 Ability Power and his Ability's meteors are larger.

augments.name: Velocity Impact
augments.desc: Gain an Aurelion Sol. His Ability stuns enemies hit for 1.75 seconds.

augments.name: Axiom Arc I
augments.desc: Your units gain 25 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Axiom Arc II
augments.desc: Your units gain 30 Mana on kill.

augments.name: Band of Thieves II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Band of Thieves I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Thief's Gloves.

augments.name: Battlemage I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Armor and 15 Ability Power.

augments.name: Battlemage II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Armor and 25 Ability Power.

augments.name: BattlemageIII
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 35 Armor and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Back for Blood
augments.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. She has 25% Omnivamp, tripled while under 50% Health.

augments.name: Voidmother
augments.desc: Gain a Bel'Veth. Combat Start: Your strongest Bel'Veth creates 2 Voidspawns with 88% of their normal Health in front of her.

augments.name: Better Together
augments.desc: Aura items that buff your team have their effects increased by 33%. Gain a Locket of the Iron Solari

augments.name: Big Friend I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 9% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Big Friend II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat next to a unit with over 1600 Health take 10% less damage for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Binary Airdrop
augments.desc: Your champions equipped with 2 items temporarily gain a random completed item at the start of combat. Gain 1 random item components.

augments.name: Birthday Present
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star champion every time you level up. The champion's tier is your level minus 4 (min: Tier 1).

augments.name: Dynamic Defenses
augments.desc: Gain a Blitzcrank and a Gargoyle Stoneplate. When he casts his Ability, its duration increases by 2 second per enemy targeting him.

augments.name: Rocket Grab
augments.desc: Gain a Blitzcrank. He has 1.5 bonus Health. Combat start: He pulls the farthest enemy and stuns them for 400 seconds.

augments.name: Blue Battery I
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 10 Mana.

augments.name: Blue Battery II
augments.desc: After casting their Ability, your units restore 20 Mana.

augments.name: Brawler Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Brawler Emblem and a Lee Sin.

augments.name: Brawler Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Brawler Emblem, Protector’s Vow, and a Riven.

augments.name: Brawler Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Brawler. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: Calculated Loss
augments.desc: After losing your combat, gain 2 gold and a free Shop refresh.

augments.name: Adaptive Defensives
augments.desc: Gain a Camille. She has 20% Attack Damage. The first time she drops below 50% Health, she gains a shield equal to 500% of her Attack Damage.

augments.name: Hextech Retribution
augments.desc: Gain a Camille. When you field her, your team deals 8% bonus damage, increasing by an additional 5% whenever an ally dies.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing I
augments.desc: Your units heal for 10% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 200 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing II
augments.desc: Your units heal for 15% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 300 Health.

augments.name: Celestial Blessing III
augments.desc: Your units heal for 25% of the damage dealt by attacks and Abilities. Excess healing is converted to a shield up to 400 Health.

augments.name: Clear Mind
augments.desc: If you have no champions on your bench at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points.

augments.name: Cluttered Mind
augments.desc: If your bench is full at the end of player combat round, gain 3 experience points. Gain 4 random Tier 1 champions.

augments.name: Combat Training
augments.desc: Your Champions permanently gain 1 Attack Damage every time they kill an enemy unit. Champions start with 8% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Component Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain 3 random item components.

augments.name: Consistency
augments.desc: Gain double win and loss streak gold.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of gold. But Heal 3 Health per player combat.

augments.name: Cursed Crown
augments.desc: Gain +2 maximum team size, but take 100% increased player damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 10% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 20% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Implants III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 30% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and 30 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and 40 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Shell III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and 60 Armor.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink I
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 80 Health and restore 2 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink II
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 120 Health and restore 2.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Cybernetic Uplink III
augments.desc: Your champions holding an item gain 200 Health and restore 3.5 Mana per second.

augments.name: Defender Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Defender Emblem and a Poppy.

augments.name: Defender Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Defender Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Riven.

augments.name: Defender Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Defender. Gain a Rell.

augments.name: Disintegrator I
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 2% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator II
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 3% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Disintegrator III
augments.desc: Your units' attacks deal bonus magic damage equal to 4% of the target's maximum Health.

augments.name: Exiles I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 25% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 35% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Exiles III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat with no adajacent allies gain a 50% maximum Health shield for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Stand United I
augments.desc: Your units gain 1.5% Attack Damage and 1.5 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United II
augments.desc: Your units gain 2 Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: Stand United III
augments.desc: Your units gain 3 Attack Damage and Ability Power per Trait active across your army.

augments.name: League of Draven
augments.desc: Gain a Draven. He gains 25% Attack Damage. When he kills an enemy, there is a 35% chance to gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Ruthless Blades
augments.desc: Gain a Draven. When you field him, your team gains 55% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Duelist Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem and a Yasuo.

augments.name: Duelist Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Duelist Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Nilah.

augments.name: Duelist Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Duelist. Gain a Fiora.

augments.name: Destructive Resonance
augments.desc: Gain an Ekko. Ekko’s spell hits all enemies within 3 hexes, and deals 240% bonus damage, but no longer slows enemies’ Attack Speed.

augments.name: Chronobreak
augments.desc: Gain an Ekko. When you field him, he stuns all enemies for 2.5 seconds after 8 seconds of combat.

augments.name: Electrocharge I
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 30-90 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge II
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Electrocharge III
augments.desc: When your units receive critical strikes, they deal 100-205 (based on current Stage) magic damage to nearby enemies. (1 second cooldown).

augments.name: Rising Spell Force
augments.desc: Gain an Ezreal. When he casts his Ability, he gains 16%% Attack Speed and 16 Ability Power for the rest of combat (this can stack).

augments.name: Raider's Spoils
augments.desc: Gain an Ezreal. Combat Start: Your strongest Ezreal grants his nearest ally a temporary Artifact for the rest of combat.

augments.name: Featherweights I
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 20% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights II
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost champions gain 30% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Featherweights III
augments.desc: Your 1 and 2 cost units gain 50% Attack Speed and Move Speed.

augments.name: Scarier-crow
augments.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Fiddlesticks continues absorbing Corrupted Souls even while no longer dormant. If he is still dormant after 8 seconds, he immediately casts. Fiddlesticks’ spell can critically strike.

augments.name: Absolute Corruption
augments.desc: Gain a Fiddlesticks. Combat Start: Fiddlesticks grants its nearest ally 30 Ability Power and allows them to share its Corrupted souls.

augments.name: Grand Challenge
augments.desc: Gain a Fiora. Every 4 attacks on the all unit. she deals 20% of her maximum health as magic damage, and heals for 12% of her maximum health.

augments.name: Vitality of the Ox
augments.desc: Gain a Fiora. When you field her, your team heals 25% of their maximum Health when they 10 attack.

augments.name: First Aid Kit
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 25%.

augments.name: First Aid Kit II
augments.desc: All healing and shielding on your units is increased by 35%.

augments.name: Future Sight I
augments.desc: Know who you will fight next. Gain a Zephyr.

augments.name: Future Sight II
augments.desc: Know who you fight next. Gain a Radiant Zephyr.

augments.name: Gadgeteen Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Gadgeteen Emblem, Ionic Spark and an Annie.

augments.name: Gadgeteen Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Gadgeteen. Gain an Poppy.

augments.name: Gadgeteen crest
augments.desc: Gain a Gadgeteen Emblem and an Annie.

augments.name: Gadget Expert
augments.desc: Direct Damage items deal 25% more damage as true damage. Gain a Statikk Shiv.

augments.name: Flaming Ricochet
augments.desc: Gain a Gangplank. His Ability bounces to a second target dealing 80% damage.

augments.name: Get Paid
augments.desc: Gain a Gangplank. When you field him, your team has a 50% chance to gain 1 gold on kill.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is refreshed, you have a 50% chance to gain a free refresh.

augments.name: High Roller
augments.desc: Gain 3 Loaded Dice and 3 gold.

augments.name: Hacker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Hacker Emblem and 2 gold.

augments.name: Hacker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Hacker Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Leblanc.

augments.name: Hacker Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Hacker. Gain a pyke.

augments.name: Heart Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Heart Emblem and a Lee sin.

augments.name: Heart Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Heart Emblem, Guardbreaker, and a Sona.

augments.name: Heart Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Heart. Gain a Lee Sin.

augments.name: High End Shopping
augments.desc: Champions appear in your Shop as if you were 1 level higher. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Hustler
augments.desc: Instead of having no interest, you get 3 golds at the beginning of player combat rounds.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item.

augments.name: Item Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 2 random completed items and 2 Reforgers.

augments.name: Category Five
augments.desc: Gain a Janna. She gains 10 Ability Power and her ability does True Damage.

augments.name: Exaggerated Reporting
augments.desc: Gain a Janna. Forecaster's effects are increased by 200%.

augments.name: Relentless Assault
augments.desc: Gain a Jax. After every 3rd attack, he gains 18% Attack Speed for the rest of combat (this can stack).

augments.name: Grandmaster’s Training
augments.desc: Gain a Jax. When you field him, your team gains 20 Armor and 12% Attack Speed. These bonuses are doubled when your strongest Jax dies.

augments.name: Jeweled Lotus
augments.desc: Magic and true damage from your units' Abilities can critically strike. Your units gain 20% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Get Excited!
augments.desc: Gain a Jinx. She gains 30% Attack Speed and Move speed. When she scores a takedown this amount is tripled for 6 seconds.

augments.name: Everyone Goes BOOM!
augments.desc: Gain a Jinx. When you field her, your team gains 9% Attack Speed, tripled after the first enemy dies each combat.

augments.name: Reconnaissance team
augments.desc: Gain a Kai’Sa. At the start of combat, Kai’Sa and her two closest allied champions gain 40% Critical Strike Chance and their spells can crit.

augments.name: Multi-Shot
augments.desc: Gain a Kai'Sa. Gain 10 AP, Every 2 projectiles, she fires a bonus attack at a nearby enemy.

augments.name: Divine Ascent
augments.desc:
Gain a Kayle. She gains bonuses per star level.
1: 40% Attack Speed
2: +2 Attack Range
3: Attacks fire 2 additional bolts dealing 50% damage.

augments.name: Righteous Range
augments.desc: Gain a Kayle. Combat Start: She and her 2 nearest allies gain +2 Attack Range and 33% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Knife's Edge I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 15 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the front 2 rows gain 25 Attack Damage.

augments.name: Knife's Edge III
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the first 2 rows gain 55% Attack Damage.

augments.name: LaserCorps Crest
augments.desc: Gain an LaserCorps Emblem and a Yasuo.

augments.name: LaserCorps Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional  LaserCorps. Gain a Hand of Justice, and a Yasuo.

augments.name: Lasercorps Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional LaserCorps. Gain a Yasuo.

augments.name: Last Stand
augments.desc: The first time you would die, instead drop to 1 Health. After this effect triggers, your units gain 180 Health, 18 Armor and Magic Resist, and 18% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Lategame Specialist
augments.desc: Gain 44 gold when you reach Level 9.

augments.name: Aim Assist
augments.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. For every 3 sigils fired by her Ability, she fires an extra sigil at the lowest Health enemy.

augments.name: Mirror Image
augments.desc: Gain a LeBlanc. Combat start: Your strongest LeBlanc duplicates her nearest ally (without items at 99% Health).

augments.name: Cleansing Safeguard
augments.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. His Ability costs 15 less Mana to cast. When he casts, he sheds all negative effects and heals 15% of his missing Health.

augments.name: Invigorate
augments.desc: Gain a Lee Sin. When your field him, your team gains 20% Attack Speed, doubled for 4 seconds after being shielded.

augments.name: Perfected Solar Flare
augments.desc: Gain a Leona. She has 30 Ability Power and her Abilities cost 40 less Mana to cast.

augments.name: Eclipse Prime
augments.desc: Gain a Leona. When you field her, your team takes 20 less damage.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Living Forge
augments.desc: Gain a random Ornn item now and after every 10 player combats.

augments.name: Lucky Gloves
augments.desc: Thief's Gloves will always give your champions items. Gain 2 Sparring Gloves.

augments.name: Luden's Echo I
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 35-80 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo II
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 50-110 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Luden's Echo III
augments.desc: When your units cast and deal Ability damage, the first target hit and a nearby enemy take 90-210 (based on current Stage) magic damage.

augments.name: Growth Spurt
augments.desc: Gain a Lulu. When she casts her Ability, she gains 100 bonus Health and 18 Ability Power (this can stack).

augments.name: Foster Growth
augments.desc: Gain a Lulu. When you field her, she and allies holding an item gain 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Illuminating Singularity
augments.desc: Gain a Lux. Every 2nd cast, her Ability deals 150% increased damage.

augments.name: Lucent Barrier
augments.desc: Gain a Lux. Combat Start: She grants her 2 nearest allies a 500 Health Shield and 35 Ability Power.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor I
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 30 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor II
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 45 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Makeshift Armor III
augments.desc: Your units with no items gain 65 Armor and Magic Resist.

augments.name: Rock Solid
augments.desc: Gain a Malphite. He has Ability Power equal to 130% of his Armor and his Ability's Armor duration is increased by 4 seconds.

augments.name: Guardian Spirit
augments.desc: Gain a Malphite. When you field him, your team restores 20% of their missing Health when they cast Abilities.

augments.name: Mascot Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mascot Emblem and a Lee sin.

augments.name: Mascot Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mascot Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and an Malphite.

augments.name: Mascot Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Mascot. Gain a Malphite.

augments.name: Level Up!
augments.desc: When you buy experience points, gain an additional 3. You can now reach level 10.

augments.name: Mecha: PRIME Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem and a Draven.

augments.name: Mecha: PRIME Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mecha: PRIME Emblem,  Bloodthirster, and a Jax.

augments.name: Metabolic Accelerator
augments.desc: Your Tactician moves faster and heals 2 Health after a PVP round.

augments.name: Bunny Mercenary
augments.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. Her Ability covers a wider cone and she gains a 200 Health shield while channeling.

augments.name: Make It Rain
augments.desc: Gain a Miss Fortune. After every 3 player combats fielded, she drops 10-25 gold (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Not So Heavy Metal
augments.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. He gains 20 Ability Power every 5 seconds.

augments.name: Obliterate
augments.desc: Gain a Mordekaiser. Combat start: He Shreds and Sunders enemies by 20%.

augments.name: Stacks on Stacks
augments.desc: Gain a Nasus. He gains 20% Attack Damage, increased by 3% permanently each time he casts his Ability.

augments.name: Soul Eater
augments.desc: Gain a Nasus. When you field him, he and his allies heal 275 Health on takedowns.

augments.name: New Recruit
augments.desc: Gain +1 maximum team size.

augments.name: Gifted
augments.desc: Gain a Nilah. She gains 40 Ability Power. Combat Start: Your strongest Nilah grants her nearest ally a temporary copy of one of her normal items.

augments.name: Jubilant Veil
augments.desc: Gain a Nilah. Combat start: She and her 4 nearest allies gain immunity to crowd control for 20 seconds.

augments.name: They See Me Rolling
augments.desc: Gain a Nunu. He has 25 Ability Power and 20% movement speed.

augments.name: Contagious Laughter
augments.desc: Gain a Nunu. When you field him, your team gains 10 Ability Power and an additional 10 every 5 seconds.

augments.name: Ox Force Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Ox Force Emblem and an Annie.

augments.name: Ox Force Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Ox Force Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and an Alistar.

augments.name: Ox Force Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Ox Force. Gain a Fiora.

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every turn, Champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc: Gain a random component. At the start of each round, items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown, Spatula, and consumables).

augments.name: Bigger, Better Buckler
augments.desc: Gain a Poppy. She gains 180 Armor.

augments.name: Steadfast Presence
augments.desc: Gain a Poppy. Combat start: Your strongest Poppy grants your team a 375 Health shield.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 3 unique Artifacts crafted by Ornn.

augments.name: Prankster Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Prankster Emblem and a Jinx.

augments.name: Prankster Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Prankster Emblem, Titan’s Resolve, and a Gnar.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc: Open an Armory and choose 1 of 5 unique Radiant items.

augments.name: Armored-dillo
augments.desc: Gain a Rammus. When you field him, your team gains 40 Armor, doubled for himself.

augments.name: Spiked Shell
augments.desc: Gain a Rammus. When struck by an attack, he deals magic damage equal to 150% of his Armor to all nearby enemies (once every 2 seconds).

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 Tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Hold the Line
augments.desc: Gain a Rell. She has 60 Ability Power and 35% damage reduction.

augments.name: Channelled Ferromancy
augments.desc: Gain a Rell. When you field her, your team gains 20 Armor and Magic Resist. and 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

augments.name: Renegade Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Renegade Emblem and a Lucian.

augments.name: Renegade Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Renegade Crown, a Bloodthirster, and a Camille.

augments.name: Renegade Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Renegade. Gain a Camille.

augments.name: Reign of Anger
augments.desc: Gain a Renekton. He gains 40% Attack Speed and an extra 4% per 100 missing Health.

augments.name: Cull the Meek
augments.desc: Gain a Renekton. When you field him, your team deals 8% bonus damage, tripled against enemies below 50% Health.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold. Your maximum interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Reverberation
augments.desc: Gain a Riven. She has 15 Ability Power and her Ability is additionally cast on her lowest Health ally.

augments.name: Triumphant Return
augments.desc: Gain a Riven. Combat Start: She grants herself and adjacent allies a shield for 15 seconds equal to 45% of their maximum Health.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a componenet after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Style & Flair
augments.desc: Gain a Samira. She gains 30% Attack Damage. When she scores a takedown, she restores 30% of her maximum Mana.

augments.name: Daredevil
augments.desc: Gain a Samira. Your team gains 3.5% Attack Speed for each 10 Tactician Health missing.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons I
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Time and a Half
augments.desc: Gain a Sivir. After each player combat round, gain 1 gold for every 42 Attack Damage your strongest Sivir has.

augments.name: Mana Tempering
augments.desc: Gain a Sivir. When you field her, your team gains 20% Attack Damage, and 5% when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Grants 2 Experience immediately. Gain bonus experience equal to your current player level at the beginning of player combat rounds. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Power Grid
augments.desc: Gain a Sona. She has 10 Ability Power and her Ability fires 1 additional beam.

augments.name: Undercurrent
augments.desc: Gain a Sona. Combat Start: Your strongest Sona grants her 2 nearest allies 50 Mana.

augments.name: Spellslinger Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem and an Annie.

augments.name: Spellslinger Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Spellslinger Emblem, Hand of Justice, and a Sona.

augments.name: Spellslinger Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Spellslinger. Gain an Annie.

augments.name: Star Guardian Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem and a Rell.

augments.name: Star Guardian Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Star Guardian Emblem, a Tear Of The Goddess and a Nilah.

augments.name: Star Guardian Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Star Guardian. Gain a Rell.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Supers Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Malphite.

augments.name: Supers Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Super. Gain a Titan's Resolve and a Lee Sin.

augments.name: Sureshot Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sureshot Emblem and a Sivir.

augments.name: Sureshot Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sureshot Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and a Sivir.

augments.name: Sureshot Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Sureshot. Gain a Sivir.

augments.name: Kingslayer
augments.desc: Gain a Sylas. Gain maximum 25% and increase damage 30%.

augments.name: Petricite Chains
augments.desc: Gain a Sylas. When you field him, your team gains 30 starting Mana and his Ability increases enemies' maximum Mana by 35%.

augments.name: Not In Vain
augments.desc: Gain a Syndra. Your strongest Syndra gains 40 starting Mana, and 75% Attack Speed every time an ally dies.

augments.name: Empowered Reserves
augments.desc: Gain a Syndra. When you field her, your team gains 5 Ability Power per unit and item on your bench.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 10 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a massive golden egg that hatches in 11 turns. If you won vs player, receive bonus turn.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Threat Level: Maximum
augments.desc: At the start of combat, your Threats gain 66 Maximum Health for every Threat champion on your board.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Your Tactician heals 30 Health, grows larger, and has 130 maximum Health.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 4 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 175-325 Health and 40-70% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 250-600 Health and 45-80% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 75 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 33 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 44% Attack Damage and 44 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Underground Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Vi.

augments.name: Underground Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Underground. Gain a Zz’Rot portal and an Ezreal.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Shiny
augments.desc: Gain an Urgot. His Ability has an extra 25% chance to dredge up treasure.

augments.name: Rising Tide
augments.desc: Gain an Urgot. Combat Start: He grants adjacent allies 30% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Spread Shot
augments.desc: Gain a Vayne. Her Ability also fires at 2 other nearby enemies, dealing 44% damage.

augments.name: Into the Night
augments.desc: Gain an Edge of Night and a Vayne. When you field her, allies equipped with Edge of Night gain 35% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Unrelenting Force
augments.desc: Gain a Vi. When she takes or deals damage, she gains 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist, stacking up to 25 times.

augments.name: Boxing Lessons
augments.desc: Gain a Vi. When you field her, your team gains 250 bonus Health.

augments.name: Heartstopper
augments.desc: Gain a Viego. He has 10 Ability Power and his Ability deals up to 50% increased damage based on the enemy's missing Health.

augments.name: Partners in Crime
augments.desc: Gain a Viego. When you field him, your team gains 12% Omnivamp, tripled when 2 or less allies remain.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

augments.name: Cyclone
augments.desc: Gain a Wukong. He has 18 Ability Power and +1 hex Ability range.

augments.name: Re-Energize
augments.desc: Gain a Wukong. When you field him, your team restores 66% of their Mana after their first cast each combat.

augments.name: Winds of the Wanderer
augments.desc: Gain a Yasuo. His spell is bigger and does 8% increases damage.

augments.name: Spirit of the Exile
augments.desc: Gain a Yasuo. When you field him, allies who start combat with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Deathbringer
augments.desc: Gain an Aatrox. His Abilities deal additional damage equal to 15% of his Maximum Health.

augments.name: Darkin Assimilation
augments.desc: Gain an Aatrox. When you field him, 40% of the damage your team receives is instead dealt over 3 seconds as non-lethal damage.

augments.name: Full Power to Sword
augments.desc: Gain a Garen. His ability costs 50 less Mana to cast and deals additional damage equal to 180% of his Attack Damage, but no longer stuns.

augments.name: My Sword is Your Shield
augments.desc: Gain a Garen. Combat Start and when your strongest Garen casts his ability: Garen shields allies for 12% of their maximum health for 4 seconds.

augments.name: Synchronous Plating
augments.desc: Gain a Gnar. He gains 45 Armor and Magic Resistance, plus another 5 until the end of combat every time he damages an enemy with his Ability.

augments.name: Temper Tantrum
augments.desc: Gain a Gnar. When you field him, enemies take 10% more damage, increased to 20% the first time they are damaged by Gnar's attacks or Ability.

augments.name: Rule of Four
augments.desc: Gain a Jhin. Every 4 takedowns he gets each combat, he drops 2-4 gold(base on current Stage). He also drops 10% an item component.

augments.name: Wrath of the Rift
augments.desc: Gain a Jhin. When you field him, your units that start combat in the back 2 rows deal 16% bonus damage.

augments.name: Hyperbolic Time Chamber
augments.desc: Gain a Lucian. The first time your strongest Lucian casts his Ability each combat, and every 3 times afterwards, gain 2 experience point.

augments.name: Enchanted Ammunition
augments.desc: Gain a Lucian. When you field him, your team gains 30 Ability Power, and 1 When they attack (this can stack).

augments.name: Fear is Freedom
augments.desc: Gain a Morgana. Morgana sends out 1 additional Dark Binding when she casts her Ability, and her Dark Bindings stun their targets for 0.5 additional second.

augments.name: Gas Giant Slayer
augments.desc: Gain a Morgana. When you field her, your team's abilities and attacks deal 30% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

augments.name: Easy Being Green
augments.desc: Gain a Neeko and a Spear of Shojin. When you field her, allies holding Spear of Shojin gain 35% Ability Power.

augments.name: Starlight Resonance
augments.desc: Gain a Neeko. On combat start and when your strongest Neeko casts her Ability, she grants herself and her closest ally 18 Ability Power until the end of combat.

augments.name: The Best Offense
augments.desc: Gain a Pantheon. He gains 40 Ability Power and 100 Magic Resistance.

augments.name: Chronic Hallucinations
augments.desc: Gain a Pantheon. Combat start: He and his 4 nearest allies take 60% reduced damage for 6 seconds.

augments.name: Your Cut
augments.desc: Gain a Pyke. After player combat rounds, gain 1 guaranteed shop refresh, 1 free Shop refresh(es) for every 2 time(s) your strongest Pyke cast his Ability last round.

augments.name: Small Game Hunter
augments.desc: Gain a Pyke. When you field him, your team's abilities and attacks deal 10% more damage, increased to 25% against enemies with less than 1400 maximum Health.

augments.name: Time Knife
augments.desc: Gain a Shen. His spell costs 10 less Mana, and after casting his spell, his next 3 attack(s) deal bonus true damage equal to 250% of his Armor

augments.name: Recursion Matrix
augments.desc: Gain a Shen. When you field him, your team takes 7% reduced damage, tripled for 4 seconds when they cast Abilities.

augments.name: Ante up
augments.desc: Gain a Twisted Fate. Your strongest Twisted Fate drops 1 gold every 20-10 cards thrown each combat (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Gear Shift
augments.desc: Gain a Twisted Fate. When you field him, your team gains 12% Attack Speed, doubled after they cast their Ability the first time each combat.

augments.name: Temporal Disruption
augments.desc: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. Enemies damaged by Ultimate Ezreal's Ability are 2% Burned and 33% Wounded.

augments.name: Accelerated Mentorship
augments.desc: Gain an Ultimate Ezreal. After player combat rounds where you fielded him, gain 8 experience points.

augments.name: Joy Siphon
augments.desc: Gain a Vex. Vex heals the 2 lowest health units on your team for 30% of the damage she deals with abilities and attacks.

augments.name: Endless Darkness
augments.desc: Gain a Vex. When you field her, your team gains 20 Ability Power, and 5 when they cast Abilities (this can stack).

augments.name: Infiniteam Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Infiniteam. Gain a Lucian.

augments.name: Big Data
augments.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him, your units deal 0.65% increased damage for every 100 Health they have.

augments.name: Well Fed+
augments.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 150 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 3 times your strongest Warwick attacks.

augments.name: Infiniteam Crown
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Infiniteam. Gain a Guinsoo's Rageblade and a Sivir.

augments.name: Quickdraw Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Quickdraw. Gain an Ezreal.

augments.name: Quickdraw Soul
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Quickdraw. Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet and an Ezreal.

augments.name: Riftwalker Heart
augments.desc: Your team counts as having 1 additional Riftwalker. Gain a Pyke.

augments.name: Riftwalker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Riftwalker Emblem and 2 gold.

augments.name: Riftwalker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Riftwalker Emblem, Sparring Gloves, and a Pyke.

augments.name: Well Fed
augments.desc: Gain a Warwick. When you field him your team gains 60 Maximum Health. This is increased by 1 every 3 times your strongest Warwick attacks.

augments.name: Infiniteam Crest
augments.desc: Gain Infiniteam Emblem and a Sivir.

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain a random completed item now, and a componenet after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks apart their full items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).
